revision.text: {{also|Yellowtail}} ==English== {{wikipedia}} ===Etymology=== [[bahuvrihi|Bahuvrihi]] compound of {{compound|en|yellow|tail}} ===Adjective=== {{en-adj|-}} # {{lb|en|in the names of certain organisms}} Having a yellow tail. ===Noun=== {{en-noun|s|yellowtail}} # [[yellowtail amberjack|Yellowtail amberjack]] (''[[Seriola lalandi]]''). # A fish native to the northwest [[Pacific]], often used in [[sushi]], the [[Japanese amberjack]] ({{taxlink|Seriola quinqueradiata|species|noshow=1|ver=171026}}). # Any of various fish with yellow tails, including: ## {{vern|Atlantic bumper}} ({{taxlink|Chloroscombrus chrysurus|species|noshow=1|ver=171026}}). ## {{vern|yellowtail flounder}} ({{taxlink|Limanda ferruginea|species|noshow=1|ver=171026}}). ## {{vern|yellowtail snapper}} ({{taxlink|Ocyurus chrysurus|species|noshow=1|ver=171026}}). ## {{vern|whitespotted devil}} ({{taxlink|Plectroglyphidodon lacrymatus|species|noshow=1|ver=171026}}). ## {{vern|yellowtail horse mackerel}} ({{taxlink|Trachurus novaezelandiae|species|noshow=1|ver=171026}}). # A European moth ({{taxlink|Euproctis similis|species|ver=171026}}) # The [[yellow-tailed black cockatoo]] (''[[Calyptorhynchus funereus]]''), a large cockatoo native to the south-east of Australia. # The {{vern|yellow-tailed oriole}} ({{taxlink|Icterus mesomelas|species|ver=171026}}), a [[passerine]] bird in the New World family [[Icteridae]]. # The {{vern|yellow-tailed woolly monkey}} ({{taxlink|Oreonax flavicauda|species|ver=171026}}), a [[New World]] primate endemic to Peru. ====Synonyms==== * {{sense|{{taxlink|Seriola quinqueradiata|species|noshow=1}}}} {{vern|buri|novern=1}}, {{l|en|hamachi}}, {{l|en|Japanese amberjack}} ====Derived terms==== * {{vern|yellowtail cribo}} ({{taxlink|Drymarchon corais corais|subspecies|ver=171026}}) * {{l|en|yellowtail amberjack}} ({{taxlink|Seriola quinqueradiata|species|noshow=1|ver=171026}}) * {{l|en|yellowtail barracuda}} ({{taxlink|Sphyraena flavicauda|species|noshow=1|ver=171026}}) * {{vern|yellowtail flounder}} ({{taxlink|Limanda ferruginea|species|ver=171026}}, syn. {{taxlink|Pleuronectes ferruginea|species|ver=171026}}) * {{vern|yellowtail horse mackerel}} ({{taxlink|Trachurus novaezelandiae|species|ver=171026}}) * {{vern|yellowtail snapper}} ({{taxlink|Ocyurus chrysurus|species|noshow=1|ver=171026}}) ===References=== * {{R:OneLook}} * {{R:Century 1911}} * {{pedia|Yellowtail (fish)}} [[Category:English 3-syllable words]] [[Category:English bahuvrihi compounds]] [[Category:en:Flatfish]] [[Category:en:Icterids]] [[Category:en:Jackfish]] [[Category:en:Labroid fish]] [[Category:en:New World monkeys]] [[Category:en:Noctuoid moths]] [[Category:en:Cockatoos]] [[Category:en:Snappers]] [[Category:English adjective-noun compound nouns]]
